body: All the buffers are allocated in [system memory](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs/rdma.cc#L296-L299), so CUDA8 should not play a role here. My impression is that `ibv_reg_mr` does pin the memory, although I am not familiar with the source code. @shamoya may be able to explain it.
